name: First Person Pinball Shooter
description:
AD move sideways

W: pick up/ go forward

S: switch to gun

O: left hand

P: right hand

Hold Space bar to release ball

FPPS is my march entry for the 2020 HEJ game jams for the theme of Unlikely Video Game Genre Mixes. I combined a Doom like FPS shooter with a pinball game and this is what I got.

Game by Prokisch Dani

Music by Boruzs Ádám
